name: Stay away I am contagious
description:
This game was created for the #6 Extra Credits game jam. The theme of the jam was "Take Care".

This game is about a scientist who just got hold of a dangerous virus and the packaging has been compromized. He has to run through a crowded mall to a safe room, trying both to be quick enough that the virus does not escape completely but also trying to take care not to move to close to anyone else or they will also get infected.
